title: [Large-Scale] Case-Based Online Workshop for Teacher Professional Development and Strengthening Reform Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and elementary mathematics curriculum content
context.additional_context: A professional development program for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to innovate mathematics instruction. It includes case studies and project-based learning using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the characteristics of teacher professional development stages (emerging, developing, advanced) and design field-applicable strategies.
Learners can evaluate the process of exercising teacher agency and propose improvement strategies through case study analysis.
Learners can develop and implement project-based assessment tools for mathematics curriculum innovation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
